mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, email, birth, gender) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender})
mapper.select: --> select id from member where id=#{id}
select id, name , email, to_char(birth, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as birth, gender from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, birth= (select TO_CHAR(#{birth}), 'YYYYMMDD') from member, gender=#{gender}, point=0 where id=#{id}
